text: did you see lieutenant Mannion on the

lemon because I just shot Barney quill I
told him to go back to his trailer and
then I would call the State Police
how did lieutenant Mannion appear to you
when he asked you to take him he said
what he had to say did I told him there
wasn't any fuss did he appear to you to
be as far as you could tell in complete

Your Honor I apologize happen it won't

in
